title: Solo Facilitator Response Schema v1.0
description: Schema for solo facilitator responses with strict validation rules

reflect.description: 1-2 short sentences: what you might be feeling/valuing (neutral tone)

reframe.description: 1 short sentence offering a kinder, testable interpretation

options.description: Small, actionable steps they can take

starter.description: One gentle, open-ended sentence you can say to your partner (not a demand)

check.description: One short question inviting consent to try a step

total_sentences.description: Total sentence count across all fields
